name: melo-ui
description: Simple web UI for the Melo compiler.

scripts.refresh: mkdir -p dist && rm -rf dist/* && cp -r static/* dist && npm run rebuild-api
scripts.release: npm run refresh && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/.bin/parcel build index.html
